contentBlocks.title: General Spa Pump Requirements
paragraphs: Spa pumps must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Spa pumps must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa pumps must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Spa pumps must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Spa pumps must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Spa pumps must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.
Spa pumps must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa pumps must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Spa pumps must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa pumps must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Spa pumps must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.
Spa pumps must be installed by a qualified person.
